src.pizza module

This module defines the Pizza class, which represents a single pizza with its crust, sauce, cheese, and optional toppings, and can compute its total cost.

class src.pizza.Pizza(crust, sauce, cheese, toppings)[source]

Bases: object

A class to represent an individual pizza

Parameters:

  • crust (str) – The crust of the pizza.

  • sauce (str) – The sauce of the pizza.

  • cheese (str) – The type of cheese on the pizza.

  • toppings (List[str]) – A list of toppings on the pizza.

CRUST_PRICES = {'gluten free': 8, 'thick': 6, 'thin': 5}
SAUCE_PRICES = {'liv': 5, 'marinara': 2, 'pesto': 3}
TOPPING_PRICES = {'mushrooms': 3, 'pepperoni': 2, 'pineapple': 1}
cost()[source]

Calculate the total cost of this pizza.

Combines:

  • Crust cost

  • Sauce cost

  • Topping cost

Returns:

The total cost of the pizza.

Return type:

float
